name: BeatSaberPC
description:
So, I decided to make BeatSaber, but for PC users :)

Most people don't have a VR set, but they want to play BeatSaber, so for those people out there, here it is, remade for PC :D

Controls:

Move mouse to arrow directions

Example:

If there is an arrow pointing up on the bottom of the cube, move your mouse up from under the cube to slice it.

W,A,S,D for red

W = slice up from bottom

A = Slice left from right

S = Slice down from top

D = Slice right from left
